text: 3.18: Ais 55.1; Mt 13.44; 2 Ko 5.3; Ze 2.5; VB 3.5; 4.4; 7.13; 16.15Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gu mba ndɨkndɨgar nden nɨɨn za mbui. Nan gor, vhav za ana tuav, anan vhen ki bigi mbatɨgi, ana za nta vhɨzgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde nan gor ga vhezɨri. Nde ana vhezgirga, nde guigira ŋkɨɨa vhɨrve guarira kɨrga. Nde vhɨra shagi huri ga vhezgip, nta shargirim, nta nde fhava vharari. Maaŋ muuŋgirga, mba gumgi nde ganɨnga, nde mbugumra ki ne suaŋv mberɨrga fhu. Nde vhɨra won rɨmanin vhorga marasin ga vhezgip, won rɨmanin vhuigirim, nden rɨmani nzerarim, nde tuituigip ganɨnga.
